bookReviews.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
bookReviews.author: Harper Lee
bookReviews.subject: Literary fiction
bookReviews.overview: A classic coming-of-age story set in the Deep South during the 1930s.
quotes: You never really understand a person until you consider things from his point of view.
Until I feared I would lose it, I never loved to read. One does not love breathing.
vocabulary: Inscrutable: impossible to understand or interpret
Aesthetic: relating to the appreciation of beauty

quotes: So we beat on, boats against the current, borne back ceaselessly into the past.
